subject: Order #113-8441411-4470628 from Amazon
description_text:
Hi, I ordered a Simsonn Pro Plus X-P3-H3 Pedals with baseplate and the Vam 3PCS set. However, I only received the Vam 3 PCS Set. Can you please send the pedal set?
Thanks,
Austin Edington-Moore

conversations.body_text: Hi Austin Moore,     Hi, I am sorry for it. We have reshipped a new package to you from our US warehouse, here is the tracking number: 887406456810 , â€‹  the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack

Thank you for the quick response and ship! Hopefully i get it soon
Thanks,
Austin Edington-Moore

>
